text: Renju (Japanese and ) is a version of the board game Gomoku. The game comes from Japan. It is played in many other countries including China, Korea, Russia, Estonia and Sweden. It is played with black and white stones on a Go board. == Other websites == * Renju International Federation has complete rules and history of the game * Nihon Renju Sha Japanese Renju Federation * Korean Omok Association (omok is the Korean name of the game) * China Renju federation (RIF China) Category:Board games Category:Japanese culture
title: Renju
